ACCELSAB.MX.summary: Accel, S.A.B. de C.V. provides manufacturing and logistics services in Mexico and the United States. The company's Manufacturing division offers sweets and nuts, as well as engages in the real estate activities. Its Logistics division offers integral solutions for management, conservation, conditioning, and distribution of merchandise; collection, selection, and delivery of goods; inventory control; packaging and labeling; crossing platform; and other services. Accel, S.A.B. de C.V. is based in Mexico City, Mexico.
